records.location_details: A boat carrying a number of people was first sighted by a Frontex participating unit in Turkish territorial waters in the Eastern Aegean Sea.
records.where_clear: Turkish territorial waters in the Eastern Aegean Sea
records.geocodable_query: Turkish territorial waters Eastern Aegean Sea
records.context_note: On 19 April 2020, a boat with people was sighted by a Frontex unit in Turkish territorial waters. Turkish authorities were informed, and the Hellenic Coast Guard took measures to address the illegal border crossing, ensuring safety and compliance with international law and European legislation. The situation involved efficient coordination between Greek and Turkish authorities, respecting all parties' rights and considering COVID-19 related health risks for preventing unauthorized border crossings.
records.evidence_quote: As regards the circumstances of the event that took place on 19 April 2020, please be informed on the followings: These circumstances involved a boat carrying a number of people which was first sighted by a Frontex participating unit in Turkish territorial waters.
